Food truck quinoa nesciunt laborum eiusmod. Brunch 3 wolf moon tempor, sunt aliqua put a bird on it squid single-origin coffee nulla assumenda shoreditch et. Nihil anim keffiyeh helvetica, craft beer labore wes anderson cred nesciunt sapiente ea proident. Ad vegan excepteur butcher vice lomo. Integrate Masonry with the Bootstrap grid system and
Masonry is not included in Bootstrap. Add it by including the JavaScript plugin manually, or using a CDN like
By adding data-masonry='{"percentPosition": true }' to the .row wrapper, we can
combine the powers of Bootstrap's responsive grid and Masonry's positioning.
